name: NOVIKOV - A Guide to Fixing the Universe
name_original: NOVIKOV - A Guide to Fixing the Universe
description:
Look, everyone makes mistakes. The universe is a broad strokes kind of boss anyways, so occasionally some details are left out, or some things get misplaced. And that is where you come in: Your job is to fill in the blanks, to make everything work, make sure everything is consistent to stop the universe from collapsing in on itself. Now stop asking stupid questions and get out there!

NOVIKOV is an abstract puzzle game inspired by physics! Make your way through 36 levels while learning about concepts from general relativity! Included is a fully functional level editor to create and share levels with your friends.
